29 ParticleFilter::ParticleFilter(struct PFinitData& data)
30  : nh_(data.nh), mainRobotID_(data.mainRobotID - 1),
31  nTargets_(data.nTargets), nStatesPerRobot_(data.statesPerRobot),
32  nRobots_(data.nRobots),
33  nSubParticleSets_(data.nTargets * STATES_PER_TARGET +
34  data.nRobots * data.statesPerRobot + 1),
35  nLandmarks_(data.nLandmarks), robotsUsed_(data.robotsUsed),
36  landmarksMap_(data.landmarksMap),
37  dynamicVariables_(data.nh, data.nRobots),
38  iteration_oss(new std::ostringstream("")),
39  nParticles_(dynamicVariables_.nParticles),
40  particles_(nSubParticleSets_, subparticles_t(nParticles_)),
41  seed_(time(0)), initialized_(false),
42  bufLandmarkObservations_(
43  data.nRobots, std::vector<LandmarkObservation>(data.nLandmarks)),
44  bufTargetObservations_(data.nRobots),
45  weightComponents_(data.nRobots, subparticles_t(nParticles_, 0.0)),
46  state_(data.statesPerRobot, data.nRobots,
47  dynamicVariables_.velocityEstimatorStackSize),
48  targetIterationTime_(), odometryTime_(), iterationEvalTime_(), mutex_(),
49  dynamicServer_(), O_TARGET(data.nRobots * data.statesPerRobot),
50  O_WEIGHT(nSubParticleSets_ - 1), numberIterations(0),
51  durationSum(ros::WallDuration(0))
52 {
53  ROS_INFO("Created particle filter with dimensions %d, %d",
54  (int)particles_.size(), (int)particles_[0].size());
55 
56  // Bind dynamic reconfigure callback
57  dynamic_reconfigure::Server<pfuclt_omni_dataset::DynamicConfig>::CallbackType
58  callback;
59  callback = boost::bind(&ParticleFilter::dynamicReconfigureCallback, this, _1);
60  dynamicServer_.setCallback(callback);
61 
62  // Advertise target velocity
63  velPublisher_ = nh_.advertise<geometry_msgs::Vector3>("/target/velocity", 10);
64 }
65 
66 void ParticleFilter::dynamicReconfigureCallback(
67  pfuclt_omni_dataset::DynamicConfig& config)
68 {
69  // Skip first callback which is done automatically for some reason
70  if (dynamicVariables_.firstCallback)
71  {
72  dynamicVariables_.firstCallback = false;
73  return;
74  }
75 
76  if (!initialized_)
77  return;
78 
79  ROS_INFO("Dynamic Reconfigure Callback:\n\tparticles = "
80  "%d\n\tvelocity_estimator_stack_size = "
81  "%d\n\tresampling_percentage_to_keep = "
82  "%f\n\tpredict_model_stddev = "
83  "%f\n\tOMNI1_alpha=%s\n\tOMNI3_alpha=%s\n\tOMNI4_alpha=%s\n\tOMNI5_"
84  "alpha=%s",
85  config.particles, config.groups.target.velocity_estimator_stack_size,
86  config.groups.resampling.percentage_to_keep,
87  config.groups.target.predict_model_stddev,
88  config.groups.alphas.OMNI1_alpha.c_str(),
89  config.groups.alphas.OMNI3_alpha.c_str(),
90  config.groups.alphas.OMNI4_alpha.c_str(),
91  config.groups.alphas.OMNI5_alpha.c_str());
92 
93  // Resize velocity estimator if value changed
94  if (dynamicVariables_.velocityEstimatorStackSize !=
95  config.groups.target.velocity_estimator_stack_size)
96  {
97  ROS_INFO("Resizing target velocity estimator to %d",
98  config.groups.target.velocity_estimator_stack_size);
99  state_.targetVelocityEstimator.resize(
100  config.groups.target.velocity_estimator_stack_size);
101  }
102 
103  // Resize particles and re-initialize the pf if value changed
104  if (dynamicVariables_.nParticles != config.particles)
105  {
106  ROS_INFO("Resizing particles to %d and re-initializing the pf",
107  config.particles);
108 
109  resize_particles(config.particles);
110  nParticles_ = config.particles;
111  }
112 
113  // Update with desired values
114  dynamicVariables_.velocityEstimatorStackSize =
115  config.groups.target.velocity_estimator_stack_size;
116  dynamicVariables_.nParticles = config.particles;
117  dynamicVariables_.resamplingPercentageToKeep =
118  config.groups.resampling.percentage_to_keep;
119  dynamicVariables_.targetRandStddev =
120  config.groups.target.predict_model_stddev;
121 
122 // Alpha values updated only if using the original dataset
123 #ifdef RECONFIGURE_ALPHAS
124  dynamicVariables_.fill_alpha(0, config.groups.alphas.OMNI1_alpha);
125  dynamicVariables_.fill_alpha(2, config.groups.alphas.OMNI3_alpha);
126  dynamicVariables_.fill_alpha(3, config.groups.alphas.OMNI4_alpha);
127  dynamicVariables_.fill_alpha(4, config.groups.alphas.OMNI5_alpha);
128 #endif
129 }
130 
131 void ParticleFilter::spreadTargetParticlesSphere(float particlesRatio,
132  pdata_t center[3],
133  float radius)
134 {
135  uint particlesToSpread = nParticles_ * particlesRatio;
136 
137  boost::random::uniform_real_distribution<> dist(-radius, radius);
138 
139  for (uint p = 0; p < particlesToSpread; ++p)
140  {
141  for (uint s = 0; s < STATES_PER_TARGET; ++s)
142  particles_[O_TARGET + s][p] = center[s] + dist(seed_);
143  }
144 }
145 
146 void ParticleFilter::predictTarget()
147 {
148  *iteration_oss << "predictTarget() -> ";
149 
150  using namespace boost::random;
151 
152  // Random acceleration model
153  normal_distribution<> targetAcceleration(TARGET_RAND_MEAN,
154  dynamicVariables_.targetRandStddev);
155 
156  for (int p = 0; p < nParticles_; p++)
157  {
158  // Get random accelerations
159  pdata_t accel[STATES_PER_TARGET] = { targetAcceleration(seed_),
160  targetAcceleration(seed_),
161  targetAcceleration(seed_) };
162 
163  // Use X and Y velocity estimates
164  for (uint s = 0; s < STATES_PER_TARGET - 1; ++s)
165  {
166  pdata_t diff = 0.5 * accel[s] * pow(targetIterationTime_.diff, 2);
167 
168  particles_[O_TARGET + s][p] += diff;
169 
170  /*
171  ROS_DEBUG_COND(
172  p == 0,
173  "Target[%d] predicted a difference of %fm after iterationTime "
174  "= %fs and velocity %fm/s",
175  s, diff, targetIterationTime_.diff, state_.target.vel[s]);
176  */
177  }
178 
179  // but for Z only the random acceleration model
180  particles_[O_TARGET + O_TZ][p] +=
181  0.5 * accel[O_TZ] * pow(targetIterationTime_.diff, 2);
182  }
183 }
184 
185 void ParticleFilter::fuseRobots()
186 {
187  *iteration_oss << "fuseRobots() -> ";
188 
189  // Save the latest observation time to be used when publishing
190  savedLatestObservationTime_ = latestObservationTime_;
191 
192  // Keeps track of number of landmarks seen for each robot
193  std::vector<uint> landmarksSeen(nRobots_, 0);
194 
195  // Will track the probability propagation based on the landmark observations
196  // for each robot
197  std::vector<subparticles_t> probabilities(nRobots_,
198  subparticles_t(nParticles_, 1.0));
199 
200  // For every robot
201  for (uint r = 0; r < nRobots_; ++r)
202  {
203  // If not used, skip
204  if (false == robotsUsed_[r])
205  continue;
206 
207  // Index offset for this robot in the particles vector
208  uint o_robot = r * nStatesPerRobot_;
209 
210  // For every landmark
211  for (uint l = 0; l < nLandmarks_; ++l)
212  {
213  // If landmark not seen, skip
214  if (false == bufLandmarkObservations_[r][l].found)
215  continue;
216  else
217  ++(landmarksSeen[r]);
218 
219  // Reference to the observation for easier access
220  LandmarkObservation& m = bufLandmarkObservations_[r][l];
221 
222  // Observation in robot frame
223  Eigen::Matrix<pdata_t, 2, 1> Zrobot(m.x, m.y);
224 
225  // Landmark in global frame
226  Eigen::Matrix<pdata_t, 2, 1> LMglobal(landmarksMap_[l].x,
227  landmarksMap_[l].y);
228 
229  for (uint p = 0; p < nParticles_; ++p)
230  {
231 
232  // Robot pose <=> frame
233  Eigen::Rotation2D<pdata_t> Rrobot(-particles_[o_robot + O_THETA][p]);
234  Eigen::Matrix<pdata_t, 2, 1> Srobot(particles_[o_robot + O_X][p],
235  particles_[o_robot + O_Y][p]);
236 
237  // Landmark to robot frame
238  Eigen::Matrix<pdata_t, 2, 1> LMrobot = Rrobot * (LMglobal - Srobot);
239 
240  // Error in observation
241  Eigen::Matrix<pdata_t, 2, 1> Zerr = LMrobot - Zrobot;
242 
243  // The values of interest to the particle weights
244  // Note: using Eigen wasn't of particular interest here since it does
245  // not allow for transposing a non-dynamic matrix
246  float expArg = -0.5 * (Zerr(O_X) * Zerr(O_X) / m.covXX +
247  Zerr(O_Y) * Zerr(O_Y) / m.covYY);
248  float detValue = 1.0; // pow((2 * M_PI * m.covXX * m.covYY), -0.5);
249 
250  /*
251  ROS_DEBUG_COND(
252  p == 0,
253  "OMNI%d's particle 0 is at {%f;%f;%f}, sees landmark %d with "
254  "certainty %f%%, and error {%f;%f}",
255  r + 1, particles_[o_robot + O_X][p], particles_[o_robot + O_Y][p],
256  particles_[o_robot + O_THETA][p], l, 100 * (detValue * exp(expArg)),
257  Zerr(0), Zerr(1));
258  */
259 
260  // Update weight component for this robot and particular particle
261  probabilities[r][p] *= detValue * exp(expArg);
262  }
263  }
264  }
265 
266  // Reset weights, later will be multiplied by weightComponents of each robot
267  resetWeights(1.0);
268 
269  // Duplicate particles
270  particles_t dupParticles(particles_);
271 
272  for (uint r = 0; r < nRobots_; ++r)
273  {
274  // Again, if robot not used, skip
275  if (false == robotsUsed_[r])
276  continue;
277 
278  // Check that at least one landmark was seen, if not send warning
279  // Update the weight component otherwise, to the previously calculated
280  // probability accumulation
281  // But.. fuse anyway since the weight component will be the value from last
282  // time it saw some landmark
283  if (0 == landmarksSeen[r])
284  ROS_WARN("In this iteration, OMNI%d didn't see any landmarks, so the "
285  "fusing will be skipped for it",
286  r + 1);
287  else
288  weightComponents_[r] = probabilities[r];
289 
290  // Index offset for this robot in the particles vector
291  uint o_robot = r * nStatesPerRobot_;
292 
293  // Create a vector of indexes according to a descending order of the weights
294  // components of robot r
295  std::vector<uint> sorted = order_index<pdata_t>(weightComponents_[r], DESC);
296 
297  // For every particle
298  for (uint p = 0; p < nParticles_; ++p)
299  {
300  // Re-order the particle subsets of this robot
301  uint sort_index = sorted[p];
302 
303  // Copy this subparticle set from dupParticles' sort_index particle
304  copyParticle(particles_, dupParticles, p, sort_index, o_robot,
305  o_robot + nStatesPerRobot_ - 1);
306 
307  // Update the particle weight (will get multiplied nRobots times and get a
308  // lower value)
309  particles_[O_WEIGHT][p] *= weightComponents_[r][sort_index];
310  }
311  }
312 }
313 
314 void ParticleFilter::fuseTarget()
315 {
316  *iteration_oss << "fuseTarget() -> ";
317 
318  // If ball not seen by any robot, just skip all of this
319  bool ballSeen = false;
320  for (std::vector<TargetObservation>::iterator it =
321  bufTargetObservations_.begin();
322  it != bufTargetObservations_.end(); ++it)
323  {
324  if (it->found)
325  {
326  ballSeen = true;
327  break;
328  }
329  }
330 
331  // Update ball state
332  state_.target.seen = ballSeen;
333 
334  // exit if ball not seen by any robot
335  if (!ballSeen)
336  {
337  *iteration_oss << "Ball not seen ->";
338 
339  // Insert zeros in the velocity estimator
340  state_.targetVelocityEstimator.insertZeros();
341 
342  return;
343  }
344  // If program is here, at least one robot saw the ball
345 
346  // Instance variables to be worked in the loops
347  pdata_t maxTargetSubParticleWeight, totalWeight;
348  uint m, p, mStar, r, o_robot;
349  std::vector<pdata_t> probabilities(nRobots_);
350  float expArg, detValue, Z[3], Zcap[3], Z_Zcap[3];
351  TargetObservation* obs;
352 
353  // For every particle m in the particle set [1:M]
354  for (m = 0; m < nParticles_; ++m)
355  {
356  // Keep track of the maximum contributed weight and that particle's index
357  maxTargetSubParticleWeight = -1.0;
358  mStar = m;
359 
360  // Find the particle m* in the set [m:M] for which the weight contribution
361  // by the target subparticle to the full weight is maximum
362  for (p = m; p < nParticles_; ++p)
363  {
364  // Vector with probabilities for each robot, starting at 0.0 in case the
365  // robot hasn't seen the ball
366  probabilities.assign(nRobots_, 0.0);
367 
368  // Observations of the target by all robots
369  for (r = 0; r < nRobots_; ++r)
370  {
371  if (false == robotsUsed_[r] || false == bufTargetObservations_[r].found)
372  continue;
373 
374  // Usefull variables
375  obs = &bufTargetObservations_[r];
376  o_robot = r * nStatesPerRobot_;
377 
378  // Observation model
379  Z[0] = obs->x;
380  Z[1] = obs->y;
381  Z[2] = obs->z;
382  Zcap[0] =
383  (particles_[O_TARGET + O_TX][p] - particles_[o_robot + O_X][m]) *
384  (cos(particles_[o_robot + O_THETA][m])) +
385  (particles_[O_TARGET + O_TY][p] - particles_[o_robot + O_Y][m]) *
386  (sin(particles_[o_robot + O_THETA][m]));
387  Zcap[1] =
388  -(particles_[O_TARGET + O_TX][p] - particles_[o_robot + O_X][m]) *
389  (sin(particles_[o_robot + O_THETA][m])) +
390  (particles_[O_TARGET + O_TY][p] - particles_[o_robot + O_Y][m]) *
391  (cos(particles_[o_robot + O_THETA][m]));
392  Zcap[2] = particles_[O_TARGET + O_TZ][p];
393  Z_Zcap[0] = Z[0] - Zcap[0];
394  Z_Zcap[1] = Z[1] - Zcap[1];
395  Z_Zcap[2] = Z[2] - Zcap[2];
396 
397  expArg = -0.5 * (Z_Zcap[0] * Z_Zcap[0] / obs->covXX +
398  Z_Zcap[1] * Z_Zcap[1] / obs->covYY +
399  Z_Zcap[2] * Z_Zcap[2] / .04);
400  detValue =
401  1.0; // pow((2 * M_PI * obs->covXX * obs->covYY * 10.0), -0.5);
402 
403  // Probability value for this robot and this particle
404  probabilities[r] = detValue * exp(expArg);
405 
406  // ROS_DEBUG_COND(r==4 && m == 0 && p < 50, "Prob(OMNI4) = %f",
407  // probabilities[r]);
408 
409  // Debugging a bit
410  /*
411  ROS_DEBUG_COND(
412  !p && !m, "OMNI%d particle 0 is at {%f;%f;%f}, measured {%f;%f;%f} "
413  "and the ball subparticles are {%f; %f; %f}",
414  r + 1, particles_[o_robot + O_X][0], particles_[o_robot + O_Y][0],
415  particles_[o_robot + O_THETA][0], obs.x, obs.y, obs.z,
416  particles_[O_TARGET + O_TX][0], particles_[O_TARGET + O_TY][0],
417  particles_[O_TARGET + O_TZ][0]);
418  */
419  }
420 
421  // Total weight contributed by this particle
422  totalWeight =
423  std::accumulate(probabilities.begin(), probabilities.end(), 0.0);
424 
425  // If the weight is the maximum as of now, update the maximum and set
426  // particle p as mStar
427  if (totalWeight > maxTargetSubParticleWeight)
428  {
429  // Swap particle m with m* so that the most relevant (in terms of
430  // weight)
431  // target subparticle is at the lowest indexes
432  maxTargetSubParticleWeight = totalWeight;
433  mStar = p;
434  }
435  }
436 
437  // Particle m* has been found, let's swap the subparticles
438  for (uint i = 0; i < STATES_PER_TARGET; ++i)
439  std::swap(particles_[O_TARGET + i][m], particles_[O_TARGET + i][mStar]);
440 
441  // Update the weight of this particle
442  particles_[O_WEIGHT][m] *= maxTargetSubParticleWeight;
443  }
444 
445  // The target subparticles are now reordered according to their weight
446  // contribution
447 
448  // printWeights("After fuseTarget(): ");
449 }
450 
451 void ParticleFilter::modifiedMultinomialResampler(uint startAt)
452 {
453  // Implementing a very basic resampler... a particle gets selected
454  // proportional to its weight and startAt% of the top particles are kept
455 
456  particles_t duplicate(particles_);
457 
458  std::vector<pdata_t> cumulativeWeights(nParticles_);
459  cumulativeWeights[0] = duplicate[O_WEIGHT][0];
460 
461  for (int par = 1; par < nParticles_; par++)
462  {
463  cumulativeWeights[par] =
464  cumulativeWeights[par - 1] + duplicate[O_WEIGHT][par];
465  }
466 
467  int startParticle = nParticles_ * startAt;
468 
469  // Robot particle resampling starts only at startParticle
470  for (int par = startParticle; par < nParticles_; par++)
471  {
472  boost::random::uniform_real_distribution<> dist(0, 1);
473  float randNo = dist(seed_);
474 
475  int m = 0;
476  while (randNo > cumulativeWeights[m])
477  m++;
478 
479  copyParticle(particles_, duplicate, par, m, 0, O_TARGET - 1);
480  }
481 
482  // Target resampling is done for all particles
483  for (int par = 0; par < nParticles_; par++)
484  {
485  boost::random::uniform_real_distribution<> dist(0, 1);
486  float randNo = dist(seed_);
487 
488  int m = 0;
489  while (randNo > cumulativeWeights[m])
490  m++;
491 
492  copyParticle(particles_, duplicate, par, m, O_TARGET,
493  nSubParticleSets_ - 1);
494  }
495 
496  // ROS_DEBUG("End of modifiedMultinomialResampler()");
497 }
498 
499 void ParticleFilter::resample()
500 {
501  *iteration_oss << "resample() -> ";
502 
503  for (uint r = 0; r < nRobots_; ++r)
504  {
505  if (false == robotsUsed_[r])
506  continue;
507 
508  uint o_robot = r * nStatesPerRobot_;
509 
510  pdata_t stdX = pfuclt_aux::calc_stdDev<pdata_t>(particles_[o_robot + O_X]);
511  pdata_t stdY = pfuclt_aux::calc_stdDev<pdata_t>(particles_[o_robot + O_Y]);
512  pdata_t stdTheta =
513  pfuclt_aux::calc_stdDev<pdata_t>(particles_[o_robot + O_THETA]);
514 
515  state_.robots[r].conf = 1 / (stdX + stdY + stdTheta);
516 
517  // ROS_DEBUG("OMNI%d stdX = %f, stdY = %f, stdTheta = %f", r + 1, stdX,
518  // stdY,
519  // stdTheta);
520  }
521 
522  // Calc. sum of weights
523  pdata_t weightSum = std::accumulate(particles_[O_WEIGHT].begin(),
524  particles_[O_WEIGHT].end(), 0.0);
525 
526  // ROS_DEBUG("WeightSum before resampling = %f", weightSum);
527 
528  // printWeights("before resampling: ");
529 
530  if (weightSum < MIN_WEIGHTSUM)
531  {
532  ROS_WARN("Zero weightsum - returning without resampling");
533 
534  // Print iteration and state information
535  *iteration_oss << "FAIL! -> ";
536 
537  converged_ = false;
538  resetWeights(1.0 / nParticles_);
539  return;
540  }
541 
542  converged_ = true;
543 
544  // All resamplers use normalized weights
545  for (uint p = 0; p < nParticles_; ++p)
546  particles_[O_WEIGHT][p] = particles_[O_WEIGHT][p] / weightSum;
547 
548  modifiedMultinomialResampler(dynamicVariables_.resamplingPercentageToKeep /
549  100.0);
550 
551  // printWeights("after resampling: ");
552 }
553 
554 void ParticleFilter::estimate()
555 {
556  *iteration_oss << "estimate() -> ";
557 
558  pdata_t weightSum = std::accumulate(particles_[O_WEIGHT].begin(),
559  particles_[O_WEIGHT].end(), 0.0);
560 
561  // ROS_DEBUG("WeightSum when estimating = %f", weightSum);
562 
563  subparticles_t normalizedWeights(particles_[O_WEIGHT]);
564 
565  // Normalize the weights
566  for (uint p = 0; p < nParticles_; ++p)
567  normalizedWeights[p] = normalizedWeights[p] / weightSum;
568 
569  if (weightSum < MIN_WEIGHTSUM)
570  {
571  ROS_WARN(
572  "Didn't estimate, performed reset in velocity estimator to be safe");
573 
574  // Print iteration and state information
575  *iteration_oss << "DONE without estimating!";
576 
577  // Reset velocity estimator and target velocity
578  state_.targetVelocityEstimator.reset();
579  state_.target.vel[O_TX] = state_.target.vel[O_TY] =
580  state_.target.vel[O_TZ] = 0.0;
581 
582  // Increase standard deviation for target prediction
583  if (dynamicVariables_.targetRandStddev != TARGET_RAND_STDDEV_LOST)
584  {
585  dynamicVariables_.oldTargetRandSTddev =
586  dynamicVariables_.targetRandStddev;
587  dynamicVariables_.targetRandStddev = TARGET_RAND_STDDEV_LOST;
588  }
589 
590  // Don't estimate
591  return;
592  }
593 
594  // Return (if necessary) to old target prediction model stddev
595  dynamicVariables_.targetRandStddev = dynamicVariables_.oldTargetRandSTddev;
596 
597  // For each robot
598  for (uint r = 0; r < nRobots_; ++r)
599  {
600  // If the robot isn't playing, skip it
601  if (false == robotsUsed_[r])
602  continue;
603 
604  uint o_robot = r * nStatesPerRobot_;
605 
606  // A vector of weighted means that will be calculated in the next loop
607  std::vector<double> weightedMeans(nStatesPerRobot_ - 1, 0.0);
608 
609  // For theta we will obtain the mean of circular quantities, by converting
610  // to cartesian coordinates, placing each angle in the unit circle,
611  // averaging these points and finally converting again to polar
612  double weightedMeanThetaCartesian[2] = { 0, 0 };
613 
614  // ..and each particle
615  for (uint p = 0; p < nParticles_; ++p)
616  {
617  // Accumulate the state proportionally to the particle's normalized weight
618  for (uint g = 0; g < nStatesPerRobot_ - 1; ++g)
619  {
620  weightedMeans[g] += particles_[o_robot + g][p] * normalizedWeights[p];
621  }
622 
623  // Mean of circular quantities for theta
624  weightedMeanThetaCartesian[O_X] +=
625  cos(particles_[o_robot + O_THETA][p]) * normalizedWeights[p];
626  weightedMeanThetaCartesian[O_Y] +=
627  sin(particles_[o_robot + O_THETA][p]) * normalizedWeights[p];
628  }
629 
630  // Put the angle back in polar coordinates
631  double weightedMeanThetaPolar =
632  atan2(weightedMeanThetaCartesian[O_Y], weightedMeanThetaCartesian[O_X]);
633 
634  // Save in the robot state
635  // Can't use easy copy since one is using double precision
636  state_.robots[r].pose[O_X] = weightedMeans[O_X];
637  state_.robots[r].pose[O_Y] = weightedMeans[O_Y];
638  state_.robots[r].pose[O_THETA] = weightedMeanThetaPolar;
639  }
640 
641  // Target weighted means
642  std::vector<double> targetWeightedMeans(STATES_PER_TARGET, 0.0);
643 
644  // For each particle
645  for (uint p = 0; p < nParticles_; ++p)
646  {
647  for (uint t = 0; t < STATES_PER_TARGET; ++t)
648  {
649  targetWeightedMeans[t] +=
650  particles_[O_TARGET + t][p] * normalizedWeights[p];
651  }
652  }
653 
654  // Update position
655  // Can't use easy copy since one is using double precision
656  state_.target.pos[O_TX] = targetWeightedMeans[O_TX];
657  state_.target.pos[O_TY] = targetWeightedMeans[O_TY];
658  state_.target.pos[O_TZ] = targetWeightedMeans[O_TZ];
659 
660  // Add to the velocity estimator
661  double timeNow = ros::Time::now().toNSec() * 1e-9;
662  state_.targetVelocityEstimator.insert(timeNow, bufTargetObservations_,
663  state_.robots);
664 
665  // Ball velocity is estimated using linear regression
666  if (state_.targetVelocityEstimator.isReadyToEstimate())
667  {
668  state_.target.vel[O_TX] = state_.targetVelocityEstimator.estimate(O_TX);
669  state_.target.vel[O_TY] = state_.targetVelocityEstimator.estimate(O_TY);
670  state_.target.vel[O_TZ] = state_.targetVelocityEstimator.estimate(O_TZ);
671 
672  // Save velocities in velocity msg and publish
673  state_.targetVelocityEstimator.velMsg.x = state_.target.vel[O_TX];
674  state_.targetVelocityEstimator.velMsg.y = state_.target.vel[O_TY];
675  state_.targetVelocityEstimator.velMsg.z = state_.target.vel[O_TZ];
676  velPublisher_.publish(state_.targetVelocityEstimator.velMsg);
677  }
678  else
679  state_.target.vel[O_TX] = state_.target.vel[O_TY] =
680  state_.target.vel[O_TZ] = 0.0;
681 
682  *iteration_oss << "DONE!";
683 }
684 
685 void ParticleFilter::printWeights(std::string pre)
686 {
687  std::ostringstream debug;
688  debug << "Weights " << pre;
689  for (uint i = 0; i < nParticles_; ++i)
690  debug << particles_[O_WEIGHT][i] << " ";
691 
692  ROS_DEBUG("%s", debug.str().c_str());
693 }
694 
695 // TODO set different values for position and orientation, targets, etc
696 // Simple version, use default values - randomize all values between [-10,10]
697 void ParticleFilter::init()
698 {
699  if (initialized_)
700  return;
701 
702  int lvalue = -10;
703  int rvalue = 10;
704 
705  std::vector<double> defRand((nSubParticleSets_ - 1) * 2);
706 
707  for (int i = 0; i < defRand.size(); i += 2)
708  {
709  defRand[i] = lvalue;
710  defRand[i + 1] = rvalue;
711  }
712 
713  std::vector<double> defPos((nRobots_ * 2), 0.0);
714 
715  // Call the custom function with these values
716  init(defRand, defPos);
717 }
718 
719 // Overloaded function when using custom values
720 void ParticleFilter::init(const std::vector<double>& customRandInit,
721  const std::vector<double>& customPosInit)
722 {
723  if (initialized_)
724  return;
725 
726  // Set flag
727  initialized_ = true;
728 
729  bool flag_theta_given = (customPosInit.size() == nRobots_ * 3 &&
730  customRandInit.size() == nSubParticleSets_ * 3);
731  size_t numVars =
732  flag_theta_given ? customRandInit.size() / 3 : customRandInit.size() / 2;
733 
734  ROS_INFO("Initializing particle filter");
735 
736  // For all subparticle sets except the particle weights
737  for (int i = 0; i < numVars; ++i)
738  {
739  ROS_DEBUG("Values for distribution: %.4f %.4f", customRandInit[2 * i],
740  customRandInit[2 * i + 1]);
741 
742  boost::random::uniform_real_distribution<> dist(customRandInit[2 * i],
743  customRandInit[2 * i + 1]);
744 
745  // Sample a value from the uniform distribution for each particle
746  for (uint p = 0; p < nParticles_; ++p)
747  particles_[i][p] = dist(seed_);
748  }
749 
750  // Particle weights init with same weight (1/nParticles)
751  resetWeights(1.0 / nParticles_);
752 
753  // Initialize pose with initial belief
754  for (uint r = 0; r < nRobots_; ++r)
755  {
756  pdata_t tmp[] = { customPosInit[2 * r + O_X], customPosInit[2 * r + O_Y],
757  -M_PI };
758  state_.robots[r].pose = std::vector<pdata_t>(tmp, tmp + nStatesPerRobot_);
759  if (flag_theta_given)
760  state_.robots[r].pose.push_back(customPosInit[2 * r + O_THETA]);
761  }
762 
763  // State should have the initial belief
764 
765  ROS_INFO("Particle filter initialized");
766 }
767 
768 void ParticleFilter::predict(const uint robotNumber, const Odometry odom,
769  const ros::Time stamp)
770 {
771  if (!initialized_)
772  return;
773 
774  *iteration_oss << "predict(OMNI" << robotNumber + 1 << ") -> ";
775 
776 #ifdef EVALUATE_TIME_PERFORMANCE
777  // If this is the main robot, update the odometry time
778  if (mainRobotID_ == robotNumber)
779  {
780  odometryTime_.updateTime(ros::WallTime::now());
781  iterationEvalTime_ = ros::WallTime::now();
782  }
783 #endif
784 
785  using namespace boost::random;
786 
787  // Variables concerning this robot specifically
788  int robot_offset = robotNumber * nStatesPerRobot_;
789  std::vector<float>& alpha = dynamicVariables_.alpha[robotNumber];
790 
791  // Determining the propagation of the robot state through odometry
792  pdata_t deltaRot = atan2(odom.y, odom.x);
793  pdata_t deltaTrans = sqrt(odom.x * odom.x + odom.y * odom.y);
794  pdata_t deltaFinalRot = odom.theta - deltaRot;
795 
796  // Create an error model based on a gaussian distribution
797  normal_distribution<> deltaRotEffective(deltaRot, alpha[0] * fabs(deltaRot) +
798  alpha[1] * deltaTrans);
799 
800  normal_distribution<> deltaTransEffective(
801  deltaTrans,
802  alpha[2] * deltaTrans + alpha[3] * fabs(deltaRot + deltaFinalRot));
803 
804  normal_distribution<> deltaFinalRotEffective(
805  deltaFinalRot, alpha[0] * fabs(deltaFinalRot) + alpha[1] * deltaTrans);
806 
807  for (int i = 0; i < nParticles_; i++)
808  {
809  // Rotate to final position
810  particles_[O_THETA + robot_offset][i] += deltaRotEffective(seed_);
811 
812  pdata_t sampleTrans = deltaTransEffective(seed_);
813 
814  // Translate to final position
815  particles_[O_X + robot_offset][i] +=
816  sampleTrans * cos(particles_[O_THETA + robot_offset][i]);
817  particles_[O_Y + robot_offset][i] +=
818  sampleTrans * sin(particles_[O_THETA + robot_offset][i]);
819 
820  // Rotate to final position and normalize angle
821  particles_[O_THETA + robot_offset][i] = angles::normalize_angle(
822  particles_[O_THETA + robot_offset][i] + deltaFinalRotEffective(seed_));
823  }
824 
825  // If this is the main robot, perform one PF-UCLT iteration
826  if (mainRobotID_ == robotNumber)
827  {
828  // Lock mutex
829  boost::mutex::scoped_lock(mutex_);
830 
831  // All the PF-UCLT steps
832  predictTarget();
833 
834 #ifndef DONT_FUSE_ROBOTS
835  fuseRobots();
836 #endif
837 
838 #ifndef DONT_FUSE_TARGET
839  fuseTarget();
840 #endif
841 
842 #ifndef DONT_RESAMPLE
843  resample();
844 #endif
845 
846  estimate();
847 
848 #ifdef EVALUATE_TIME_PERFORMANCE
849  ROS_INFO("(WALL TIME) Odometry analyzed with = %fms",
850  1e3 * odometryTime_.diff);
851 
852  deltaIteration_ = ros::WallTime::now() - iterationEvalTime_;
853  if (deltaIteration_ > maxDeltaIteration_)
854  maxDeltaIteration_ = deltaIteration_;
855 
856  durationSum += deltaIteration_;
857  numberIterations++;
858 
859  ROS_INFO_STREAM("(WALL TIME) Iteration time: "
860  << 1e-6 * deltaIteration_.toNSec() << "ms ::: Worst case: "
861  << 1e-6 * maxDeltaIteration_.toNSec() << "ms ::: Average: "
862  << 1e-6 * (durationSum.toNSec() / numberIterations) << "s");
863 #endif
864 
865  // ROS_DEBUG("Iteration: %s", iteration_oss->str().c_str());
866  // Clear ostringstream
867  iteration_oss->str("");
868  iteration_oss->clear();
869 
870  // Start next iteration
871  nextIteration();
872  }
873 }
874 
875 void ParticleFilter::saveAllLandmarkMeasurementsDone(const uint robotNumber)
876 {
877  *iteration_oss << "allLandmarks(OMNI" << robotNumber + 1 << ") -> ";
878 }
879 
880 void ParticleFilter::saveAllTargetMeasurementsDone(const uint robotNumber)
881 {
882  *iteration_oss << "allTargets(OMNI" << robotNumber + 1 << ") -> ";
883 }
884 
885 PFPublisher::PFPublisher(struct ParticleFilter::PFinitData& data,
886  struct PublishData publishData)
887  : ParticleFilter(data), pubData(publishData),
888  robotBroadcasters(data.nRobots), particleStdPublishers_(data.nRobots),
889  robotGTPublishers_(data.nRobots), robotEstimatePublishers_(data.nRobots)
890 {
891  // Prepare particle message
892  resize_particles(nParticles_);
893 
894  // Subscribe to GT data
895  GT_sub_ = nh_.subscribe<read_omni_dataset::LRMGTData>(
896  "/gtData_4robotExp", 10,
897  boost::bind(&PFPublisher::gtDataCallback, this, _1));
898 
899  // Other publishers
900  estimatePublisher_ =
901  nh_.advertise<read_omni_dataset::Estimate>("/pfuclt_estimate", 100);
902  particlePublisher_ =
903  nh_.advertise<pfuclt_omni_dataset::particles>("/pfuclt_particles", 10);
904 
905  // Rviz visualization publishers
906  // Target
907  targetEstimatePublisher_ =
908  nh_.advertise<geometry_msgs::PointStamped>("/target/estimatedPose", 1000);
909  targetGTPublisher_ =
910  nh_.advertise<geometry_msgs::PointStamped>("/target/gtPose", 1000);
911  targetParticlePublisher_ =
912  nh_.advertise<sensor_msgs::PointCloud>("/target/particles", 10);
913 
914  // target observations publisher
915  targetObservationsPublisher_ =
916  nh_.advertise<visualization_msgs::Marker>("/targetObservations", 100);
917 
918  // Robots
919  for (uint r = 0; r < nRobots_; ++r)
920  {
921  std::ostringstream robotName;
922  robotName << "omni" << r + 1;
923 
924  // particle publisher
925  particleStdPublishers_[r] = nh_.advertise<geometry_msgs::PoseArray>(
926  "/" + robotName.str() + "/particles", 1000);
927 
928  // estimated state
929  robotEstimatePublishers_[r] = nh_.advertise<geometry_msgs::PoseStamped>(
930  "/" + robotName.str() + "/estimatedPose", 1000);
931 
932  // build estimate msg
933  msg_estimate_.robotEstimates.push_back(geometry_msgs::Pose());
934  msg_estimate_.targetVisibility.push_back(false);
935 
936 // ground truth publisher, in the simulation package we have PoseStamped
937 #ifndef USE_NEWER_READ_OMNI_PACKAGE
938  robotGTPublishers_[r] = nh_.advertise<geometry_msgs::PointStamped>(
939  "/" + robotName.str() + "/gtPose", 1000);
940 #else
941  robotGTPublishers_[r] = nh_.advertise<geometry_msgs::PoseStamped>(
942  "/" + robotName.str() + "/gtPose", 1000);
943 #endif
944  }
945 
946  ROS_INFO("It's a publishing particle filter!");
947 }
948 
949 void PFPublisher::publishParticles()
950 {
951  // The eval package would rather have the particles in the format
952  // particle->subparticle instead, so we have to inverse it
953  for (uint p = 0; p < nParticles_; ++p)
954  {
955  for (uint s = 0; s < nSubParticleSets_; ++s)
956  {
957  msg_particles_.particles[p].particle[s] = particles_[s][p];
958  }
959  }
960 
961  // Send it!
962  particlePublisher_.publish(msg_particles_);
963 
964 #ifdef PUBLISH_PTCLS
965  // Also send as a series of PoseArray messages for each robot
966  for (uint r = 0; r < nRobots_; ++r)
967  {
968  if (false == robotsUsed_[r])
969  continue;
970 
971  uint o_robot = r * nStatesPerRobot_;
972  geometry_msgs::PoseArray msgStd_particles;
973  msgStd_particles.header.stamp = savedLatestObservationTime_;
974  msgStd_particles.header.frame_id = "world";
975 
976  for (uint p = 0; p < nParticles_; ++p)
977  {
978  tf2::Quaternion tf2q(tf2::Vector3(0, 0, 1),
979  particles_[o_robot + O_THETA][p]);
980  tf2::Transform tf2t(tf2q, tf2::Vector3(particles_[o_robot + O_X][p],
981  particles_[o_robot + O_Y][p],
982  pubData.robotHeight));
983 
984  geometry_msgs::Pose pose;
985  tf2::toMsg(tf2t, pose);
986  msgStd_particles.poses.insert(msgStd_particles.poses.begin(), pose);
987  }
988 
989  particleStdPublishers_[r].publish(msgStd_particles);
990  }
991 
992  // Send target particles as a pointcloud
993  sensor_msgs::PointCloud target_particles;
994  target_particles.header.stamp = ros::Time::now();
995  target_particles.header.frame_id = "world";
996 
997  for (uint p = 0; p < nParticles_; ++p)
998  {
999  geometry_msgs::Point32 point;
1000  point.x = particles_[O_TARGET + O_TX][p];
1001  point.y = particles_[O_TARGET + O_TY][p];
1002  point.z = particles_[O_TARGET + O_TZ][p];
1003 
1004  target_particles.points.insert(target_particles.points.begin(), point);
1005  }
1006  targetParticlePublisher_.publish(target_particles);
1007 
1008 #endif
1009 }
1010 
1011 void PFPublisher::publishRobotStates()
1012 {
1013  // This is pretty much copy and paste
1014  for (uint r = 0; r < nRobots_; ++r)
1015  {
1016  if (false == robotsUsed_[r])
1017  continue;
1018 
1019  std::ostringstream robotName;
1020  robotName << "omni" << r + 1;
1021 
1022  msg_estimate_.header.stamp = savedLatestObservationTime_;
1023 
1024  ParticleFilter::State::robotState_s& pfState = state_.robots[r];
1025  geometry_msgs::Pose& rosState = msg_estimate_.robotEstimates[r];
1026 
1027  // Create from Euler angles
1028  tf2::Quaternion tf2q(tf2::Vector3(0, 0, 1), pfState.pose[O_THETA]);
1029  tf2::Transform tf2t(tf2q, tf2::Vector3(pfState.pose[O_X], pfState.pose[O_Y],
1030  pubData.robotHeight));
1031 
1032  // Transform to our message type
1033  tf2::toMsg(tf2t, rosState);
1034 
1035 #ifdef BROADCAST_TF_AND_POSES
1036  // TF2 broadcast
1037  geometry_msgs::TransformStamped estTransf;
1038  estTransf.header.stamp = savedLatestObservationTime_;
1039  estTransf.header.frame_id = "world";
1040  estTransf.child_frame_id = robotName.str() + "est";
1041  estTransf.transform = tf2::toMsg(tf2t);
1042  robotBroadcasters[r].sendTransform(estTransf);
1043 
1044  // Publish as a standard pose msg using the previous TF
1045  geometry_msgs::PoseStamped estPose;
1046  estPose.header.stamp = estTransf.header.stamp;
1047  estPose.header.frame_id = estTransf.child_frame_id;
1048  // Pose is everything at 0 as it's the same as the TF
1049 
1050  robotEstimatePublishers_[r].publish(estPose);
1051 #endif
1052  }
1053 }
1054 
1055 void PFPublisher::publishTargetState()
1056 {
1057  msg_estimate_.targetEstimate.header.frame_id = "world";
1058 
1059  // Our custom message type
1060  msg_estimate_.targetEstimate.x = state_.target.pos[O_TX];
1061  msg_estimate_.targetEstimate.y = state_.target.pos[O_TY];
1062  msg_estimate_.targetEstimate.z = state_.target.pos[O_TZ];
1063  msg_estimate_.targetEstimate.found = state_.target.seen;
1064 
1065  for (uint r = 0; r < nRobots_; ++r)
1066  {
1067  msg_estimate_.targetVisibility[r] = bufTargetObservations_[r].found;
1068  }
1069 
1070 #ifdef BROADCAST_TF_AND_POSES
1071  // Publish as a standard pose msg using the previous TF
1072  geometry_msgs::PointStamped estPoint;
1073  estPoint.header.stamp = ros::Time::now();
1074  estPoint.header.frame_id = "world";
1075  estPoint.point.x = state_.target.pos[O_TX];
1076  estPoint.point.y = state_.target.pos[O_TY];
1077  estPoint.point.z = state_.target.pos[O_TZ];
1078 
1079  targetEstimatePublisher_.publish(estPoint);
1080 #endif
1081 }
1082 
1083 void PFPublisher::publishEstimate()
1084 {
1085  // msg_estimate_ has been built in other methods (publishRobotStates and
1086  // publishTargetState)
1087  msg_estimate_.computationTime = deltaIteration_.toNSec() * 1e-9;
1088  msg_estimate_.converged = converged_;
1089 
1090  estimatePublisher_.publish(msg_estimate_);
1091 }
1092 
1093 void PFPublisher::publishTargetObservations()
1094 {
1095  static std::vector<bool> previouslyPublished(nRobots_, false);
1096 
1097  for (uint r = 0; r < nRobots_; ++r)
1098  {
1099  // Publish as rviz standard visualization types (an arrow)
1100  visualization_msgs::Marker marker;
1101 
1102  if (!robotsUsed_[r])
1103  continue;
1104 
1105  // Robot and observation
1106  std::ostringstream robotName;
1107  robotName << "omni" << r + 1;
1108 
1109  TargetObservation& obs = bufTargetObservations_[r];
1110 
1111  // If not found, let's just publish that one time
1112  if (obs.found == false)
1113  {
1114  if (previouslyPublished[r])
1115  continue;
1116  else
1117  previouslyPublished[r] = true;
1118  }
1119  else
1120  previouslyPublished[r] = false;
1121 
1122  marker.header.frame_id = robotName.str() + "est";
1123  marker.header.stamp = savedLatestObservationTime_;
1124 
1125  // Setting the same namespace and id will overwrite the previous marker
1126  marker.ns = robotName.str() + "_target_observations";
1127  marker.id = 0;
1128 
1129  marker.type = visualization_msgs::Marker::ARROW;
1130  marker.action = visualization_msgs::Marker::ADD;
1131 
1132  // Arrow draw
1133  geometry_msgs::Point tail;
1134  tail.x = tail.y = tail.z = 0.0;
1135  // Point at index 0 - tail tip - is 0,0,0 because we're in the local frame
1136  marker.points.push_back(tail);
1137  // Point at index 1 - head - is the target pose in the local frame
1138  geometry_msgs::Point head;
1139  head.x = obs.x;
1140  head.y = obs.y;
1141  head.z = obs.z - pubData.robotHeight;
1142  marker.points.push_back(head);
1143 
1144  marker.scale.x = 0.01;
1145  marker.scale.y = 0.03;
1146  marker.scale.z = 0.05;
1147 
1148  // Colour
1149  marker.color.a = 1;
1150  if (obs.found)
1151  marker.color.r = marker.color.g = marker.color.b = 0.6;
1152  else
1153  {
1154  marker.color.r = 1.0;
1155  marker.color.g = marker.color.b = 0.0;
1156  }
1157 
1158  // Other
1159  marker.lifetime = ros::Duration(2);
1160 
1161  // Send it
1162  targetObservationsPublisher_.publish(marker);
1163  }
1164 }
1165 
1166 void PFPublisher::publishGTData()
1167 {
1168  geometry_msgs::PointStamped gtPoint;
1169  gtPoint.header.stamp = savedLatestObservationTime_;
1170  gtPoint.header.frame_id = "world";
1171 
1172 #ifdef USE_NEWER_READ_OMNI_PACKAGE
1173  geometry_msgs::PoseStamped gtPose;
1174  gtPose.header.stamp = savedLatestObservationTime_;
1175  gtPose.header.frame_id = "world";
1176 
1177  for (uint r = 0; r < nRobots_; ++r)
1178  {
1179  gtPose.pose = msg_GT_.poseOMNI[r].pose;
1180  robotGTPublishers_[r].publish(gtPose);
1181  }
1182 
1183 #else
1184  if (true == robotsUsed_[0])
1185  {
1186  gtPoint.point = msg_GT_.poseOMNI1.pose.position;
1187  robotGTPublishers_[0].publish(gtPoint);
1188  }
1189 
1190  if (true == robotsUsed_[2])
1191  {
1192  gtPoint.point = msg_GT_.poseOMNI3.pose.position;
1193  robotGTPublishers_[2].publish(gtPoint);
1194  }
1195 
1196  if (true == robotsUsed_[3])
1197  {
1198  gtPoint.point = msg_GT_.poseOMNI4.pose.position;
1199  robotGTPublishers_[3].publish(gtPoint);
1200  }
1201 
1202  if (true == robotsUsed_[4])
1203  {
1204  gtPoint.point = msg_GT_.poseOMNI5.pose.position;
1205  robotGTPublishers_[4].publish(gtPoint);
1206  }
1207 #endif
1208 
1209  // Publish for the target as well
1210  if (msg_GT_.orangeBall3DGTposition.found)
1211  {
1212  gtPoint.point.x = msg_GT_.orangeBall3DGTposition.x;
1213  gtPoint.point.y = msg_GT_.orangeBall3DGTposition.y;
1214  gtPoint.point.z = msg_GT_.orangeBall3DGTposition.z;
1215  targetGTPublisher_.publish(gtPoint);
1216  }
1217 }
1218 
1219 void PFPublisher::gtDataCallback(
1220  const read_omni_dataset::LRMGTData::ConstPtr& gtMsgReceived)
1221 {
1222  msg_GT_ = *gtMsgReceived;
1223 }
1224 
1225 void PFPublisher::nextIteration()
1226 {
1227  // Call the base class method
1228  ParticleFilter::nextIteration();
1229 
1230  // Publish the particles first
1231  publishParticles();
1232 
1233  // Publish robot states
1234  publishRobotStates();
1235 
1236  // Publish target state
1237  publishTargetState();
1238 
1239  // Publish estimate
1240  publishEstimate();
1241 
1242  // Publish robot-to-target lines
1243  publishTargetObservations();
1244 
1245 // Publish GT data if we have received any callback
1246 #ifdef USE_NEWER_READ_OMNI_PACKAGE
1247  if (!msg_GT_.poseOMNI.empty())
1248  publishGTData();
1249 #else
1250  publishGTData();
1251 #endif
1252 }
1253 
1254 void ParticleFilter::State::targetVelocityEstimator_s::insertZeros()
1255 {
1256  for (uint velType = 0; velType < numberVels; ++velType)
1257  {
1258  // If empty, no need to insert zeros
1259  if (timeVecs[velType].empty())
1260  return;
1261 
1262  // Figure out last known position
1263  const double lastPos = posVecs[velType].back();
1264 
1265  // Insert the same position at a new time
1266  timeVecs[velType].push_back(ros::Time::now().toNSec() * 1e-9 - timeInit);
1267  posVecs[velType].push_back(lastPos);
1268  }
1269 }
1270 
1271 void ParticleFilter::State::targetVelocityEstimator_s::insert(
1272  const double timeData, const std::vector<TargetObservation>& obsData,
1273  const std::vector<ParticleFilter::State::RobotState>& robotStates)
1274 {
1275  pdata_t ballGlobal[3];
1276  bool readyToInsert = false;
1277  size_t size = robotStates.size();
1278  uint chosenRobot = 0;
1279  pdata_t maxConf = 0.0;
1280 
1281  // ROS_DEBUG("Inserting new data in velocity estimator");
1282 
1283  // Check if the vectors are full
1284  for (uint v = 0; v < numberVels; ++v)
1285  {
1286  if (timeVecs[v].capacity() == timeVecs[v].size())
1287  {
1288  // Erase first element of both vectors
1289  timeVecs[v].erase(timeVecs[v].begin());
1290  posVecs[v].erase(posVecs[v].begin());
1291  }
1292  }
1293 
1294  // Choose the robot based on having found the ball and the maximum
1295  // confidence
1296  for (uint r = 0; r < size; ++r)
1297  {
1298  if (obsData[r].found)
1299  {
1300  // TODO these hard coded values.. change or what?
1301  if (robotStates[r].conf > maxConf &&
1302  sqrt(pow(obsData[r].x, 2) + pow(obsData[r].y, 2)) < 4.0)
1303  {
1304  readyToInsert = true;
1305  chosenRobot = r;
1306  maxConf = robotStates[r].conf;
1307  }
1308  }
1309  }
1310 
1311  // If ball hasn't be seen, don't insert and just return
1312  if (!readyToInsert)
1313  return;
1314 
1315  // Pick the state and data from the chosen robot
1316  const RobotState& rs = robotStates[chosenRobot];
1317  const TargetObservation& obs = obsData[chosenRobot];
1318  // Calc. coordinates in global frame based on observation data and robot
1319  // state belief
1320  ballGlobal[O_TX] = rs.pose[O_X] + obs.x * cos(rs.pose[O_THETA]) -
1321  obs.y * sin(rs.pose[O_THETA]);
1322  ballGlobal[O_TY] = rs.pose[O_Y] + obs.x * sin(rs.pose[O_THETA]) +
1323  obs.y * cos(rs.pose[O_THETA]);
1324  ballGlobal[O_TZ] = obs.z;
1325 
1326  // Insert data in the vectors, with special attention if the timeVec is
1327  // empty
1328  for (uint velType = 0; velType < numberVels; ++velType)
1329  {
1330  if (timeVecs[velType].empty())
1331  timeInit = ros::Time::now().toNSec() * 1e-9;
1332 
1333  timeVecs[velType].push_back(timeData - timeInit);
1334  posVecs[velType].push_back(ballGlobal[velType]);
1335  }
1336 }
1337 
1338 void ParticleFilter::State::targetVelocityEstimator_s::resize(
1339  const uint newStackSize)
1340 {
1341  // ROS_DEBUG("Resizing target velocity estimator");
1342 
1343  // Update to new stack size
1344  maxDataSize = newStackSize;
1345 
1346  // When using std::vector::resize, the last elements will be removed if the
1347  // new stack size is lower. Since we want to remove the first, we'll have to
1348  // do that manually
1349  for (uint velType = 0; velType < numberVels; ++velType)
1350  {
1351  if (newStackSize < timeVecs[velType].size())
1352  {
1353  uint sizeIter = newStackSize;
1354  uint currSize = timeVecs[velType].size();
1355  while (sizeIter > currSize)
1356  {
1357  timeVecs[velType].erase(timeVecs[velType].begin());
1358  posVecs[velType].erase(posVecs[velType].begin());
1359  sizeIter--;
1360  }
1361  }
1362 
1363  // Reserve the new size
1364  timeVecs[velType].reserve(maxDataSize);
1365  posVecs[velType].reserve(maxDataSize);
1366  }
1367 }
1368 
1369 ParticleFilter::dynamicVariables_s::dynamicVariables_s(ros::NodeHandle& nh,
1370  const uint nRobots)
1371  : alpha(nRobots, std::vector<float>(NUM_ALPHAS)), firstCallback(true)
1372 {
1373  // Get node parameters, assume they exist
1374  readParam<int>(nh, "velocity_estimator_stack_size",
1375  velocityEstimatorStackSize);
1376  readParam<double>(nh, "percentage_to_keep", resamplingPercentageToKeep);
1377 
1378  readParam<int>(nh, "particles", nParticles);
1379 
1380  readParam<double>(nh, "predict_model_stddev", targetRandStddev);
1381  oldTargetRandSTddev = targetRandStddev;
1382 
1383  // Get alpha values for some robots (hard-coded for our 4 robots..)
1384  for (uint r = 0; r < nRobots; ++r)
1385  {
1386  std::string paramName =
1387  "OMNI" + boost::lexical_cast<std::string>(r + 1) + "_alpha";
1388 
1389  std::string str;
1390  if (readParam<std::string>(nh, paramName, str))
1391  fill_alpha(r, str); // value was provided
1392  else
1393  fill_alpha(r, "0.015,0.1,0.5,0.001"); // default
1394  }
1395 }
1396 
1397 void ParticleFilter::dynamicVariables_s::fill_alpha(const uint robot,
1398  const std::string& str)
1399 {
1400  // Tokenize the string of comma-separated values
1401  std::istringstream iss(str);
1402  std::string token;
1403  uint tokenCount = 0;
1404  while (std::getline(iss, token, ','))
1405  {
1406  if (tokenCount >= NUM_ALPHAS)
1407  break;
1408 
1409  std::istringstream tokss(token);
1410  float val;
1411  tokss >> val;
1412 
1413  if (val < 0)
1414  {
1415  ROS_WARN("Invalid alpha value %f", val);
1416  continue;
1417  }
1418 
1419  alpha[robot][tokenCount] = val;
1420  ++tokenCount;
1421  }
1422 
1423  ROS_WARN_COND(tokenCount != NUM_ALPHAS,
1424  "Number of alpha values provided is not the required number %d",
1425  NUM_ALPHAS);
1426 }
1427 
1428 // end of namespace pfuclt_ptcls
1429 }
pfuclt::timeInit
ros::Time timeInit
